info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 2:00PM CDT until May 15 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MADISON AND EASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 200 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elkins to near Brentwood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... St. Paul... Wesley... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Brentwood... Japton... Drake Field Airport... Goshen... Woolsey... Crosses... Combs... Dutton... Wyola... Tuttle... Sulphur City... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 46 and 50, and between mile markers 59 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
